project_01.title: Minneapolis Public Service Building
project_01.subtitle: A space where public meets the city
project_01.description: The new City of Minneapolis Public Service Building offers a customer-centric experience as the city's public service hub, inviting the community in. Inspired by the city's parks and lakes, it features open community spaces at street level, connecting to City Hall and activating the plaza.
project_01.associate: Yuye Peng collaborated on the project at Henning Larsen

tiles.description: An amphitheater-like stair links the two levels, with a café seating area.
A light-filled skyway level connects to the city’s 9½-mile footbridge system.
tiles.photoCredit: Interior Material Concept

tiles.description: Soaring hardwoods warm double-height spaces, sparking collaboration.

tiles.descriptionContent: Massive skylight bridges office to garage, bathing service area in light.

project_01.qoute: "A contemporary alternative to civic design—demonstrating how public spaces can better reflect the communities they serve."

project_02.title: Denning House
project_02.subtitle: A hub for interdisciplinary exchange
project_02.description: A retreat offering diverse spaces for study and events, situated by Lake Lagunita. The design maximizes views by placing large public areas on the second floor. Douglas fir and cypress cladding create a treehouse-like interior, integrating the surrounding forest landscape.
project_02.associate: Haitao Zhou collaborated on the project while Associate at Ennead Architects

tiles.description: A treehouse, a special retreat hidden away in the trees. One approaches the building via a gently curving, sloping boardwalk, which gradually leaves the ground.
tiles.photoCredit: Photo © Devcon Construction

tiles.description: The major spaces here are arrayed along a shallow arcing façade, giving onto a continuous deck along the lake.
tiles.photoCredit: Photo © Tim Griffith

tiles.description: A gently sloping ceiling rises above the stair, opening the facade towards the lake, creating a continuous flowing space that moves from intimate to grand.
tiles.photoCredit: Photo © Tim Griffith

tiles.descriptionContent: The use of Douglas fir wood structure and surfaces throughout the interior and cypress cladding on the exterior, the building feels like a treehouse, hidden in the trees.
tiles.photoCredit: Photo © Tim Griffith

project_02.qoute: "A unique workspace for Stanford grad students that’s also a home for art"
project_02.awards: AIA Silicon Valley Design Awards • Chicago Athenaeum American Architecture Awards

project_03.title: California Residence
project_03.subtitle: A pavilion collects epic views
project_03.description: Situated on a north-facing slope, this two-level house maximizes views. The lower floor, set into the hill with a green roof, contains private areas. Above, a glass pavilion houses communal spaces. The extended roof provides shade and supports solar panels. Rainwater collection adds to the home's efficiency.
project_03.associate: Haitao Zhou collaborated on the project while at GLUCK+

tiles.description: A glass-sided pavilion creates a loft-like space for the communal activities of living, cooking, dining, entertaining, and so on.
tiles.photoCredit: Photo © Here and Now Agency – Paul Vu

tiles.description: A floating roof, skewed off the rectangle of the plan of the main floor, which allows for shade.
tiles.photoCredit: Photo © Here and Now Agency – Paul Vu

tiles.description: This airy space is glazed on all sides and has tall, angled ceilings that follow the outline of the sculptural roof.
tiles.photoCredit: Photo © Here and Now Agency – Paul Vu

tiles.description: The home’s den is tucked into the space at the bottom of the stairs where light pours in through the stairwell.
tiles.photoCredit: Photo © Here and Now Agency – Paul Vu

project_03.awards: 2021 AIALA Residential Architecture Award of Merit

project_04.title: UCSB Henley Hall
project_04.subtitle: An institue for energy efficiency
project_04.description: Shaping the future of energy-efficient design, UC Santa Barbara's Institute for Energy Efficiency drives the development of groundbreaking technologies to elevate global living standards.
project_04.associate: Yuye Peng collaborated on the project at KieranTimberlake

tiles.description: 3-story open-air atrium brings ambient air flow throughout the building
tiles.photoCredit: Photo © Bruce Damonte

tiles.description: A dynamic 49,900 GSF space with highly functional labs, offices, and collaborative space
tiles.photoCredit: Concept Rendering

tiles.description: A building that breathes: an automated natural ventilation system tied to operable windows
tiles.photoCredit: Photo © Bruce Damonte

tiles.descriptionContent: The design of Henley Hall integrates building users with the habitat by dematerializing the boundaries between the outdoors and in, allowing breezes to flow through the building’s atrium and extending workspaces to the outdoor green space.

project_04.qoute: "Henley Hall is an exemplary research facility proving leading paradigms in energy efficiency buildings."

project_05.title: Lighthouse Museum
project_05.subtitle: A gateway to explore maritime history
project_05.description: Transformed a lighthouse into a museum on the cliffs of Murro di Porco, creating a unique cultural landmark that blends seamlessly into the natural landscape.

tiles.description: The project aims to subtly yet forcefully integrate with its complex landscape, avoiding a brutal or overwhelming presence.
This horizontal volume extends from the existing context toward the sea, guiding people from the built environment to nature.
The new museum and lighthouse create a courtyard with unique viewpoints for visitors to sit, engage in activities, and enjoy the lighthouse views.
Unlike the solitary and slender lighthouse, the new building is simple and serves as a background, enhancing the lighthouse's presence by complementing it.

product_01.title: Prescription Delivery
product_01.subtitle: Medly Pharmacy
product_01.description: Redesigned end-to-end prescription delivery experiences from scratch, enabling simple sign-up, prescription management, and effortless scheduling of deliveries and checkouts for patients.
product_01.associate: Collaborated on the project at Medly Pharmacy, a digital pharmacy that delivers prescriptions through an iOS app.

tiles.description: Medly lets patients track prescription delivery and manage medications easily.
tiles.photoCredit: The app received hundreds of bad app reviews and customer calls for the usability issues.

tiles.description: Customers had no way to manage or schedule medications and refills within the app.
tiles.photoCredit: Led user research to define target audiences based on business goals.

tiles.description: Optimized the sign-up experience, enabled auto-refills, and simplified the checkout process.
tiles.photoCredit: Conducted a competitive study, mapped out ideal user flow, tested multiple concepts with customers.

tiles.descriptionContent: Designed the app to allow patients, especially those with more than 10 maintenance medications, to easily filter and customize their medication list on the home page.

product_01.qoute: 125% Total Billed Prescriptions Growth in 2021, Annual Revenue Run Rate (ARR) grow 32%.

product_02.title: Shop, Sell, LiveStream
product_02.subtitle: Popshop Live
product_02.description: Designed a user-friendly and efficient experience for sellers and customers, offering a range of features and tools available on native apps and the web.
product_02.associate: Collaborated with Popshop Live, which offers a new way to shop products through live shows.

tiles.description: Popshop Live aimed to allow users to create and host their own shopping channel.
tiles.photoCredit: Both Seller’s dashboard and Live Show Mobile app needed IA and UI improvement.

tiles.description: Simple, Focused, Scalable Store Profile.
tiles.photoCredit: Evolved UI through multiple phases across platforms

tiles.description: The new dashboard allows sellers to quickly track store performance data, including revenue, followers, referrals, and badge progress.

tiles.descriptionContent: Users receive notifications when they earn a new badge and can view available quests and see which other users have earned badges.

product_02.qoute: The # 1 Live Shopping Experience in the USA.
product_02.awards: Rating: 4.7 on the Apple App Store

product_03.title: Activation & Engagement
product_03.subtitle: Stash
product_03.description: Led the end-to-end growth experience which helps millions of users subscribe and start investing easily.
product_03.associate: Collaborated on the project at Stash, a subscription-based fintech company at New York.

tiles.description: Stash’s mission is to make investing easy and affordable for everyone.
tiles.photoCredit: Less than 30% of customers make a deposit or investment within the first 30 days, according to user data.

tiles.description: Customers feel not ready to subscribe and deposit in for investing.
tiles.photoCredit: User Research followed 22 participants over 5 weeks to understand their first-time experience

tiles.description: Simplified onboarding with engage-first, subscribe-later, and personalized engagement.
tiles.photoCredit: Led Vision and Strategy, defined releasing plan with PM and Engineers.

tiles.descriptionContent: Introduced a new personal portfolio featuring 3 recommended ETFs and 4 top-trending stocks, with clear definitions and explanations for each recommendation. Users can skip and make their investment choices later.

product_03.qoute: The account conversion rate increased by 6%, with 81.6% of users accessing the investment path from the Day 0 home page.

product_04.title: Provider Dashboard
product_04.subtitle: Medly Pharmacy
product_04.description: Designed and launched the end-to-end experience, defined product strategy, and implemented the MVP and new design system with PMs and engineers.
product_04.associate: Collaborated on the Medly Pharmacy project, helping providers track patient prescriptions.

tiles.description: The provider dashboard simplifies prescription tracking and approvals.
tiles.photoCredit: Users faced challenges using over 5 tools for communication and collaboration.

tiles.description: The web app was designed for healthcare providers and account managers.
tiles.photoCredit: Conducted user research to identify essential features for providers, and defined and iterated experiences through rapid testing.

tiles.description: Created a professional and trustworthy brand feeling for the audience.
tiles.photoCredit: Created new brand colors, fonts, icons, and UI components from the ground up.

tiles.descriptionContent: Enabled providers to switch between clinic-specific dashboards and patient info, simplifying the dashboard for better readability. Clearly displayed required actions for providers and categorized patients by prescription status.

product_04.qoute: Initiated 50,000 prior authorizations over the year, significantly easing providers' workload.

product_05.title: Personalized Investing Experience
product_05.subtitle: Stash
product_05.description: Led user research and design exploration, defined the launch roadmap with PMs, optimizing the investing experience and increasing engagement.
product_05.associate: Collaborated on the project at Stash, a subscription-based fintech company in New York.

tiles.description: 30% of new customers unsubscribe in the first month due to a difficult investing experience.
tiles.photoCredit: The existing experience is inconsistent, redundant, and confusing.

tiles.description: Created a simple, optimistic & approachable experience.
tiles.photoCredit: Explored five concepts and interviewed ten customers. Created content to meet customer needs and guide them in tracking long-term wealth progress.

tiles.description: The same brand with a simpler, clearer UI design.
tiles.photoCredit: Conducted unmoderated testing and refined the IA and UI based on customer feedback.

tiles.descriptionContent: Provide customers with investment recommendations, portfolio diversification tips, and stock reward opportunities. Tailored learning content is linked to actionable moments, like buying related investments.

product_05.qoute: New investment purchases increased by 25%, and the monthly churn rate decreased by 13%.
